name: Red Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.
